mapper.insert: insert into db_shopebaysummary (SID, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPENAME, YYYYMMDD, QUANTITYLIMITREMAINING, AMOUNTLIMITREMAINING, TOTALSOLDCOUNT, TOTALSOLDVALUE, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoptypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yyyymmdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantitylimitremaining,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amountlimitremaining,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalsoldcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalsoldvalue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
